page.title: 07Codford Village School
page.content: The present school was built in 1972. The old school has been converted into a house.Ours is a small school with four classes and 96 children.Our headmaster is Mr Newton. Our school has a large playing field with two rounders pitches and two football pitches.The field also has a sandpit for long jump. We have a BBC Micro B computer,a record player which can be connected to a tape recorder and two televisions. We have got a mascot called Pandora and a hamster called Tetley.We have a small hut called a pratten which we use for music and Rising Fives which is a group for children under five.Behind the school field there is a small piece of land called the rough ground.In the summer we sometimes go there to look for insects,birds and wild plants.
